Html:
Hello All,

Can someone please comment on how functional testing can be best accomplished with the Prism framework?

Wondering if it is possible to do gray box testing on a collection of objects vs against a Silverlight or WPF UI.

Thanks in advance for any comments or suggestions :)

- Bob

Hi Bob,

You can check the Acceptance Tests that come with Prism (which use White) for any pointers on how to achieve that. There are tests for each Quickstart and the Reference Implementation, so different scenarios are tested. You can take what you find useful from them.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
